definition: context/the surrounding words/same as 上下文
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: How does this parable fit into what comes before it and what comes after it?
sentences.chinese: 這個比喻與前後文是如何融爲一體的？

sentences.english: This text, the second in a three-book series, emphasizes listening in context to develop functional comprehension skills.
sentences.chinese: 本書著重在藉由前後文的輔助，訓練聽力的技巧。
